channel.title: Characters gain HP upon relogging [PI]
channel.description:
Title says it all, when a person relog's they regain hp, it virtually never stops. They could keep relogging and eventually have max hp...
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/6gwnyg.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2h7gxec.jpg[/img]
I am pretty confused as to why this is happening, I do not know where I would have to look, or how I would go about fixing this...
Any help is ridiculously appreciated Thanks,
-Darien

item.title: Characters gain HP upon relogging [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Rupt Rupt
item.description:
@Rupt wrote:

Can someone please respond to this, I’m getting this problem too :\

Read full topic

item.title: Characters gain HP upon relogging [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

In the client, everything “login” related was just corresponding with sprites
In the player.java, and playerhandler, everything “logout” related was corresponding with connections

I couldn’t find anything that had to do with health

Read full topic

item.title: Characters gain HP upon relogging [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“DarienM, post:3, topic:440858”]Where would I go exactly for that, I’m not quite sure

Sorry for asking to be spoon-fed…just fairly confused
Thanks,

-Darien[/quote]

The methods that deal with logging in/out.

Usually the login method is in the client, and the logout is in either the client, Player, or PlayerHandler

Read full topic

item.title: Characters gain HP upon relogging [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

It looks like every time they login, they’'re HP level increases by 1.

Checkout your logout/in methods and see if there’s something unusual.

Read full topic
